metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29370 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in kmem_cache_alloc_bulk in mm/slub.c in the Linux kernel before 5.5.11. The slowpath lacks the required TID increment, aka CID-fd4d9c7d0c71.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
